alert.note: Alert for Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Collier, eastern Hendry, northern Broward, southwestern Palm Beach and southern Glades Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 430 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, or 11 miles south of Lake Harbor, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, South Bay, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, Big Cypress Seminole Reservation, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Belle Glade Camp, Miccosukee Service Plaza and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Glades; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County
